" Oh i got an idea ! " She smirked at them. " Would you like to know how it feels like to fly ? " She asked, making
the little people really worried about what's gonna happen to them. The giant Super sized girl then started to turn her
hand, letting the people fall. They were all screaming until the other hand of Kara caught. She laughed at their reaction,
but they didn't have time to recover as she repeated the action again..And again... They were falling,
caught,then falling again to be caught again, for about a minute. At the end, they all seemed sick and dizzy..One of
them even threw up on her palm,which made her made. "oh bad boy ! " she said, then she picked him up with the
thumb and the forefinger from her free, and used nicely his tiny body to wipe his vomit from her divine skin.
"i'm...i'm sorry Ma'am " he said.
" it's ok but you have to be punished " she replied.
1522112111.title: She *plays* with them!

choices: ...She pretends to step on them to see their reaction
...She asks them something impossible to do,  to thanks her
1522112112.content:
The people in her hands were really scared, althought they knew she just saved them and that she
was Supergirl. But the giant size of the girl and the smirk on her face let them think that she could
do anything with them if she wanted too. Considering their fear on their face, Kara didn't know what
to do, so she put them slowly on the ground disappointed. But then, something came in her mind :.
1522112112.title: She sets them back on the ground

choices: Places her foot on them without adding pressure
15221121121.content:
The people felt relieved at first when she put them on the ground, but that feeling didn't last for
so long as they were paralyzed from what they could see above their head : she was raising
her giant foot, clearly aware of her action !
" I wonder how it feels like to squash some little humans under my boots..." She said playfully.
Their first instinct told them to run away, althought that they know they didn't stand a chance
to escape a giant girl, mainly when this girl could run faster than a bullet. But their will to live
was too strong. Kara thought on the moment that she was making a cruel joke, but as she wasn't
planning to really crush them, that was ok. So, as they were running she...
15221121121.title: ...She pretends to step on them to see their re...

choices: She let them find something to do for her
She uses them for her own pleasure
15221121122.content:
" I think there's something you could do for me to thanks me for having saved you " She said.
The little people were looking at her, not sure to know what they could be able to do for this giant
invincible woman.
She smirked and said : " you should build a statue of myself in my glory ! In full sized. But it's bigger
than me, it won't bother me either. ". Kara tried to be serious when she said that, and it worked as
the little people seemed a bit panicked. They were saying something, but Kara just pretented to
not hear them. " Oh come one, it's time to work ! I'm waiting. Unless you want to get me mad ?"
No one moved, they were looking at each other trying and talked between them. Kara used her super
ear to know what they were saying.

" she's crazy ! "
" I suggest we leave that place ! "
" Can't believe that ! She must be joking ! "

The giant Supergirl didn't like their attitude, so she decided to make her joke a reality and force them to
make something for her...

"All right guys, let's forget the statue but you'll have to thank me anyway, so..."
15221121122.title: ...She asks them something impossible to do,  t...

choices: Catch him in her mouth by taking a deep breath
152211212.content:
Luthor then rushed to Kara, but she didn't need to move as his attacks were useless. She was standing there,
as he was punching her with all the strenght of the robot, until the left arms got broken du to the shock of the
girl of Steel's body.
" Damm it ! " he said angrily.
" Is that all you have ? " She mocked. But then Luthor used the right arm of the robot to shot some kryptonite grenades.
This is where Kara started to be serious and avoid the grenades with her super speed. Then she used the laser beam from
her eyes to destroy the right arm.
" Seem you can't do anything now". She said as she walked toward him. He then used his ejection seat to escape the robot, and
activated a jetpack to fly away.

Kara then...
152211212.title: The fight begins !

choices: Use him as a personnal  sex toy
Choose another way to humiliate him
1522112122.content:
" Do you think you can really get away from me ? you'll be disappointed " Kara said as she was
flying slowly, extending her arm, opening her fist, then...." gottcha ". Her giants fingers closed around
Lex's tiny body. The helpess little man was screaming of indignation, trying to struggle in a futile attempt.
The giantess made sure she was not hurting him physically, but it was obvious for that she was crushing
his pride. And she felt satisfied.
As she landed on the ground, several people around were acclaiming Supergirl for having saved the city.

"You giant bitch !! Put me down !! " Lex shoot at her.

" Oh this is not over yet. I have to make sure you won't try anything again. And for that i have to break
you mentally "

Kara then...
1522112122.title: Fly to catch him

choices: A giant Bizarro Supergirl join the story and have her fun
Someone use a red Kryptonite on Kara, she's violent and mean

1531.content: Who should fly into the museum exhibition but sweet,innocent goody-two shoes Mary Marvel herself looking cheery "Hmmm I could do with a new size I'm tired of being merely 5'6 I would like to be a little taller I wonder...." As she touched the mystical jewel and BOOOOOMM! in a flash she was transformed into a towering 100 foot teenaged giantess the entire museum was destroyed when she burst through it Mary looked highly ashamed and fasincated "Pops didn't mean to do that but I'm enormous! Oh golly this is neat what to do first?"
1531.title: Good Mary

info.brief_description: Your favorite women superheroes and villains become giantesses. Please add!
info.description:
One of your favorite female superheroes or villains becomes a giantess. What will they do with their newfound power? Will they continue on the path they have been following, or switch sides? You decide!
Rules
*No male giants
*Giantess cannot be killed, but can be shrunken back down
*no toilet, poop, scat, etc.
*Anything else allowed

Add a lot of chapters and have fun!
